= Installation =

== Linux ==

=== Prepare ===

Install Unrar:

{{{
aptitude update
aptitude install unrar-free
}}}

== FreeBSD/pfSense ==

=== Prepare ===

Install Unrar:

{{{
cd /usr/ports/archivers/unrar; make install clean
}}}

Install Wget:
{{{
cd /usr/ports/ftp/wget; make install clean
}}}
